comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3512133775]

SPLENDID COLUMBUS MEMORIAL TO BE UNVEILED IN WASHINGTON ON SATURDAY
June 2, 1912, Sunday
In the Union Station Plaza in Washington, shrouded in canvas, but ready for its auspicious unveiling ceremonies next Saturday, stands the splendid new statue of Christopher Columbus.
